name: Mega Man: The Metall Uprising
description:
Oh no! The Metalls (AKA Mets, Met-Hat Minions, etc.) are staging an uprising! This calls for the robo-busting skills of everyone's favorite blue fighting robot, MEGA MAN!

Mega Man: The Metall Uprising is a very brief Mega Man fangame made for Riggy2k3's "C.I." Game Jam. It was my first experience in both using Game Maker: Studio and in coding a platformer.
